title: etnies LA Mission Shoe Donation 2012
description: Last Friday at the Los Angeles Mission’s annual Easter celebration, Pierre-Andre gathered a group of etnies team riders and staff to help him deliver comfort to the soles of Los Angeles’ homeless in the form of 2,000 pairs of brand new shoes. Devine Calloway, BK, Andy Bell and joined etnies staff, celebrity volunteers & Mayor Villaraigosa for the event. Pierre and filmmaker Mike Manzoori went behind the scenes on Skid Row to show how the simple gesture of giving can change lives.
